backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with storage, authorization, admin accounts, sessions, profile management, content blocks, sections, products, packages, and related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Provides feature evidence linking requirements to specific frontend files and components for background color theming and route-based styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their function, UI behavior, and data integration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theme colors, radii, and dark mode behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md: Documentation describing where admin routes are defined and listing the admin login and dashboard routes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root and admin routes, applies pink background to non-home pages, and wraps the app with language and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section with bilingual content, stats cards, icons, and animated fade‑in elements.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Provides an admin access‑denied UI with alert message, navigation buttons, and optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentBlo: Admin tool to create content blocks, including forms, image upload handling, and section selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/Diagnostic: Runs a multi‑step admin diagnostic flow checking auth, product fetching, and CRUD ops with status updates. Uses test data and ExternalBlob images to validate backend functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/HowToOrder: Manages creation and editing of How‑To‑Order steps with multilingual text and optional images. Provides a dialog for form input, image uploads, and sorted step display.
frontend/src/components/admin/InstagramF: Edits Instagram feed configuration including handle, embed code, multilingual titles/descriptions, visibility, and display order. Loads existing config and updates it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackagesMa: Provides CRUD management for package items with multilingual fields, pricing, and image uploads. Includes dialogs for editing/adding and confirmation for deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsMa: Handles product CRUD with multilingual fields, pricing, and image uploads. Supports editing via a dialog and deleting via confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/admin/SectionsMa: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting content sections with image uploads and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Admin panel to view, create, and manage admin users with a dialog-based user creation form.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Renders a localized contact form with name, email, and message fields, using toast notifications on submit. Includes icons, styling, and resets form state after submission.
Fetches additional sections and displays visible ones with localized titles, descriptions, images, and content blocks. Supports background images and ordered rendering.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays brand info, quick navigation links with smooth scrolling, social links, and a button to download UI texts. Uses localized text and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a sticky header with scroll detection, navigation links, mobile menu support, and language toggle. Smooth-scrolls to sections and updates UI based on state.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the landing hero section with background image, floating icons, localized titles, and CTA buttons. Includes smooth scrolling and decorative animations.
frontend/src/components/HowToOrder.tsx: Displays a multi‑step ordering guide with icons, translated text, and smooth scroll to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/InstagramFeed.ts: Renders a configurable Instagram section with intersection animations, using either embed code or profile fallback.
frontend/src/components/Packages.tsx: Shows a grid of predefined package cards with images, tags, and translated names/descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Displays a product catalog grid using static product metadata and translated labels.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides language state, persistence, and translation lookup for English and Spanish UI text.
frontend/src/EDITING_TEXTS_AND_IMAGES_VI: Explains where UI text and images are stored to support editing via chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin session login, validation with timeout, logout, and persistent session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and providing login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend data including products, packages, sections, users, and content.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme color variables, base styles, and custom utility classes including fade-in animations and Instagram embed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with authentication checks, loading and error states, and tabs for managing site content and users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Provides the admin login form with session handling, actor initialization checks, and error feedback.
frontend/src/texts/ui-texts.txt: Contains all UI text keys with English and Spanish translations in a simple plain‑text format.
frontend/src/texts/uiTextsSource.ts: Exports the raw UI text file and filename for consistent translation loading and downloading.
frontend/src/UI_TEXT_PLAIN_TEXT_WORKFLOW: Describes the workflow for editing UI translations stored in a single plain‑text file.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Provides helpers to store, retrieve, and clear the admin session ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/downloadUiTexts.ts: Creates and triggers a browser download of the raw UI translations text file.
frontend/src/utils/plainTextTranslations: Parses the plain‑text translation file into a key‑based object and provides a safe translation getter.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including session‑related values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a request to apply a pink logo-derived background to all non-Home pages and noting the current black background issue.
